name: Cubes Go Bang!
description:
Cubes Go Bang! is an extremely simple game: it's literally about cubes going BANG! The game is easy to understand: shoot your enemies, every time you eliminate all of them, a new level starts (the number of basic enemies is equal to the level number) and you can even get upgrades along the way.

This Top-Down Shooter is the first game I've made and it was a way to introduce myself to both Unity and coding in general. It was very fun to make and I really want to try and port it into mobile, but there are a lot of things that need to be fixed before that and I'm not sure I can do that (yet).

I followed a tutorial from Sykoo to make the base game and I used particles from the asset store (called SimpleFX). I got the sounds using SFXR and made the music on BOSCA CEOIL.
